## Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] All images render correctly in preview
- [ ] All internal links work
- [ ] Quarto renders without errors (`make render`)
- [ ] Content follows style guide (no bold labels, etc.)

### If Adding New Content
- [ ] Added entry to `index.qmd` carousel (if meeting notes)
- [ ] Updated timeline section in `index.qmd` (if applicable)
- [ ] Images are optimized (<500KB each)
- [ ] Created images directory with correct date format

### If Modifying Configuration
- [ ] Tested locally with `make preview`
- [ ] Changes are documented
